subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/Jim_Salonika_Hanukkah-2-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Went to Glendale Cemetary today (Des Moines-Iowa) Stopped at two Mausoleums. Got one evp...man said "were dead", I also went over to the Jewish Burial Site. I asked to have an Elder or someone with an accent to speak so I could have some proof. I get this EVP. It says "Jim >Salonika < Hanukka" Now I'm NOT positive it says "Solonika" but I tried to use "savonika" (spelled it something like that) and Google gave the Salonika suggestion. But I do know it says "JIM.........HANUKKAH". 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/Jim_Salonika_Hanukkah-2-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
